data.description:
Welcome to XR Ultra Physics Sandbox!

Prepare to be amazed by our extensive collection of 165 weapon types spanning across different eras and categories:

Ancient and Medieval: Wield swords, shields, and maces.
Vintage: Handle classic firearms and explosives.
Modern: Utilize the latest in military technology with cutting-edge guns and grenades.
Melee, Ranged, and Explosive: Master the art of close combat, precision shooting, and devastating blasts.
Interactive Environments

Dive into a dynamic world with:

52 Types of Destructibles: Smash, crash, and obliterate objects with stunning realism.
65 Prefab Combos of Big Destructibles: Create massive chain reactions and witness large-scale destruction.
30 Prefab Combos of Small Destructibles: Test your precision and power on detailed setups akin to a shooting range.
Engaging Opponents

Face off against a variety of bots designed to challenge and entertain:

30 Types of Bots: From tiny nuisances to giant adversaries, each with unique behaviors and strengths.

Interactive AI: Bots that follow you, chase thrown objects, or deliver powerful punches.

Ragdoll Physics: Enjoy lifelike reactions and interactions with every encounter!



Get Ready to Redefine Reality

Step into XR Ultra Physics Sandbox and transform your VR experience. With its unparalleled variety and realistic interactions, this is not just a game – it’s your new reality.

  Mixed Reality Mode Coming Soon!
